answers.answer: The blurred vision and the eye wandering out and up are very concerning so I myself would begin with a very thorough complete eye exam and medical history. Make sure to make an immediate appt with a local ophthalmolgist - make sure to be seen in the next day or so.MJK MD

question: I'm not sure if WHAT this is...My husband has had sensitivity behind one eye after flying- condition worsened. Now he has trouble focusing with both eyes- pressure behind his RT eye- slight Headache- and now his eye is wandering up and to the outside. Tested for diabetes (fasting) -waiting for the results- Thyroid OK.  He was tested for Glaucoma 6 mos ago. ??HELP!
title: Eye Help
